forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. SSE winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. SSE winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing late. Low around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
